DataElement.preferredName: 5-D Itch Scale 1 Past 2 Weeks Pruritus Duration Per Day Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation, in the past 2 weeks, of the duration per day that they experienced pruritus, using a 5 point scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: 5-D Itch Scale Past 2 Weeks Pruritus Duration Per Day Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire consisting of 5 items used to measure the course of itch by asking for the degree, duration, disability, and distribution of the pruritus within the last 2 weeks._A period of time consisting of the 14 days before the present._A question about the daily duration of pruritus experienced by an individual._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The period of time during which something continues per day._An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: To a complete degree or to the full or entire extent.: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Eighteen To Twenty Three Hour Per Day

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Eighteen To Twenty Three Hour Per Day
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than seventeen and less than nineteen and the quantity that it denotes.: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.: A natural number greater than twenty-two and less than twenty-four and the quantity that it denotes.: A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.: For each, generally denoting a ratio.: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
